artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Black warp. Woven in various width strips of orange, yellow and blue.  Plain weave.  Stapled to 8.5x11" card.  "H-8B" written on card (black, blue, yellow, orange)
